mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum r, re.* FROM ( SELECT r.ID , r.TITLE FROM RESUME r WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = #{id}) re ) WHERE r BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY r DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESUME r WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = #{id}

SELECT r.ID , r.MEMBER_ID , m.NAME , (SELECT g.TITLE FROM GENDER g WHERE g.ID = m.GENDER_ID) AS GENDER , m.BIRTHDAY , m.PHONE , m.EMAIL , (SELECT a.DISTRICT FROM ADDRESS a WHERE a.ID = m.ADDRESS_ID) || ' ' || m.DETAIL_ADDR AS ADDRESS , r.TITLE , r.PORTFOLIO FROM RESUME r LEFT OUTER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON r.MEMBER_ID = m.ID WHERE r.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM SCHOOL s WHERE s.RESUME_ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM REG r WHERE r.RESUME_ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM LIECENCE l WHERE l.RESUME_ID = #{id}
